text: Nieul-sur-l'Autise is a former commune. It is found in the region Pays de la Loire in the Vendée department in the west of France. On 1 January 2019, it became a part of the new commune of Rives-d'Autise.Arrêté préfectoral 4 December 2018 == References == Category:Former communes in Vendée
title: Nieul-sur-l'Autise
